mapper.select: select seq, title, content, regdate, nickname from review order by regdate desc
select * from review order by regdate desc limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into review (title, content, image, nickname, regdate) values (#{title }, #{content }, #{image}, #{nickname }, now())
mapper.update: update review set title=#{title }, content=#{content } ,image=#{image} where seq=#{seq }
